name: Boyertown Burial Casket Co., Appellant, v. Commonwealth
name_abbreviation: Boyertown Burial Casket Co. v. Commonwealth

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern,, Stearne, Jones, Bell and Ladner, JJ.
parties: Boyertown Burial Casket Co., Appellant, v. Commonwealth.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The respective orders appealed from are affirmed on the opinion of Judge Smith for the court below.
Orders affirmed.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Henry S. Drinker, with him Henry W. Sawyer, 3rd, Eliot B. Thomas, Lewis H. Van Dusen,Jr., and Drinker, Biddle <& Reath for appellant.
Morley W. Baker, Special Deputy Attorney General, with him Charles J. Margiotti, Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Boyertown Burial Casket Co., Appellant, v. Commonwealth.
Argued January 4, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern,, Stearne, Jones, Bell and Ladner, JJ.
Henry S. Drinker, with him Henry W. Sawyer, 3rd, Eliot B. Thomas, Lewis H. Van Dusen,Jr., and Drinker, Biddle <& Reath for appellant.
Morley W. Baker, Special Deputy Attorney General, with him Charles J. Margiotti, Attorney General, for appellee.
March 19, 1951:
